RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase

RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase Class Reference

#include <gsmainmenubase.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A super-class for main menus drawing shareable capabilities.

A main menu contains a moveable border with two panels. Typically, the right panel contains CEGUI elements.

Definition at line 316 of file gsmainmenubase.cpp.

float RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::getTranslationLenght ( float  from,
float  to 
) [protected]

Get the lenght between two points.

The to and from values are in OpenGL format (-1.0 to 1.0). So we need to calculate it.

The return value is positive is we move from right to left and negative from left to right.

Parameters:
from From where the transition begin
to Where the transition is going to
Returns:
A lenght in the OpenGL format wich can be positive or negative.

bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::isInTransition (  ) 

Is this menu in transition?

It simply returns the value of the inTransition variable.

Returns:
true if we are in transition, false otherwise

Member Data Documentation

unsigned int RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuBase::initFrameNumber [protected]

The number of initialization frame.

The number of frame during wich the transition is not made to prevent transition during graphic engine initialization
